extends java.lang.Object

      • setVelocityHeadingSetpoint

        public void setVelocityHeadingSetpoint(double forward_inches_per_sec,
                                       Rotation2d headingSetpoint)
        sets the VelocityHeadingSetpoint of this driveSystem. assumes that the setpoint desires straight line motion
        Parameters:
        forward_inches_per_sec - the desired wheel speed (applied to both wheels)
        headingSetpoint - the desired heading
